title: Ability to use premium templates as free user via https://stripo.email/templates/?utm_source=viewstripo&utm_medium=referral
content:
Summary:
Hello, I found security vulnerability in your web application, another business logic.
Steps To Reproduce
Go to https://stripo.email/templates/?utm_source=viewstripo&utm_medium=referral
Choose any premium template and click use in editor
Then sign in to save and it is in your templates
Supporting Material/References:
Down there is video showing everything
[attachment / reference]
Impact
Lose of business
steps: Choose any premium template and click 'use in editor'
Sign in to save the template
The premium template is now saved in your templates as a free user
vuln_description: The vulnerability allows free users to access and save premium templates without paying, bypassing the intended business logic that restricts premium content to paid users. This could lead to significant revenue loss for the service provider.
reason: The vulnerability involves a straightforward bypass of access controls without requiring complex interactions or state manipulation. The steps to reproduce are simple and do not involve multiple components or subtle interactions.
